website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality, vertical-display gun rack that adjusts to accommodate any shotgun or rifle.
pros: Yoke pivots to accommodate buttstocks of different sizes
Foam-covered hooks protect guns from scratches
Available in ash, cherry, oak and black walnut woods
Strong, sturdy wall rack that's easy to mount
cons: Not the ideal solution if you have many guns that need hanging

customer_reviews.title: No problems holding a guitar or a sword!
customer_reviews.text: This product does an excellent job holding an acoustic guitar, a banjo and a ninja sword I have displayed in my living areas! Both items that I have displayed using this item are held vertically, but I have no doubt that if you really like the style of this mount it would also hold items horizontally if two mounts were used. The wood backing of this mount seems as if it could be painted or stained as well because the rubber hands that hold the item can be removed making this task easier if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: JamesonMcG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and takes up little space
customer_reviews.text: I use it inside my closet near the front door. It holds the shotgun (Remington) and takes up little space. Keeps it flush against the side wall of my closet for easy access whenever I may need it to answer my front door, etc. The soft padding prevents your shotgun from getting scratched if you just want to use it for display purpose. I like the small design and ease of installation. It comes with the wall inserts and screws, so it's easy and quick to install.
customer_reviews.author: C. Niemann

customer_reviews.title: Mossberg 590A1
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Mossberg 590A1 Magpul edition. Right inside the closet for quick easy access. Hope I will never need to. Only wish there was a stud there where I mounted but the mounting screws are the top end type. They have the heavy duty anchor that screws in. Also the hanger is covered very well to protect your firearm. Well worth the price. If you are worried about security then don't hang on the wall and store in a safe. Also you could put a wire lock safety on the gun but that defeats the purpose here.
customer_reviews.author: BOGY.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my shotgun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to mount my Mossberg 500 on my wall. I have a sheet rock wall so I had to use the anchors to mount it up. The mount holds REALLY well, feels strong and my gun feels secure and within reach. I doubt that the weight of the gun can yank this off the wall. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent way to keep a long gun at the ready
customer_reviews.text: Great gun hanger! I got this to keep my Mossberg 500 hanging at the ready. It's very easy to mount and quite sturdy. It also rotates to allow the gun to hang straight no matter what kind of grip or stock you have. It's great for allowing you to hang a firearm anywhere you want and saves a lot of wall space horizontally (vs a traditional gun rack). The hooks are nicely padded, too, to minimize wear on the finish of a wood stock. Recommended if you need a hanger for a single long gun.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought more...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Matches my Pella sliding door and trim and even keeps a thumbhole stock Ruger 10/22 handy for wascally wabbits.
customer_reviews.author: Nicoantique

customer_reviews.title: Great for holding the barrel of my shotgun at the ready...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fit to hold the barrel and light, at the ready next to my bed for my Home Defense Mossberg 500 12ga. at the ready...just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.author: John Kully

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a basic wood block with a mount that screws into it and holds a rifle or shotgun. Nothing fancy. It comes with the screws and sheet rock mounts. The hook that the long gun hangs from is nicely padded. It does the job it's supposed to do and for the price 14 dollars when I got it, it was worth the convenience. It took about 10 minutes to mount all told so I am pretty happy. I don't really like the vertical hanging look but that is my aesthetic opinion and has nothing to do with the quality of the product or wether it works as designed which it does very well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Scott Carle

customer_reviews.title: Hang Your Guns And Bows With Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Great mount and very versatile for your weapon(s) of choice. I have one holding a compound bow, one holding a tactical shotgun and one holding a high powered, high capacity rifle. Slim profile so it looks great on the wall and since the hanger rotates it will find a place on your gun/bow that it will grip onto. For the price, this wall mount cannot be beat.
customer_reviews.author: JDS II

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal on a quality mount.
customer_reviews.text: This wall mount is unbeatable for the price! It's sturdy, well cushioned to protect the wooden areas of your bow or rifle, and comes with good mounting hardware. It displays the hunting bow I bought it for admirably.
customer_reviews.author: Gh0stC0de

customer_reviews.title: GOOD AND SOLID PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but don't be deceived by the image. I got the idea that it was a lot smaller. It is actually quite large which makes it suitable for bows, rifles, and shotguns. If you want to hang your guns horizontally this will cradle them perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: This is only for 1 hook, not 2.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting 2 hooks. I must've read it wrong. So naturally I was very disappointed when I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Giovani Montrose

customer_reviews.title: 'Bang' for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and easy to install. Excellent value for money solution.
customer_reviews.author: IT Guy

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: Install is very easy on this item. Its well made and hold my fully loaded, decked out AR without any issues. I am buying two or three more.
customer_reviews.author: A K Q 10 2

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these. I used 2 for a shotgun and rifle and one for a bow. They are extremely versatile and made storing my guns look good.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my Crossbows
customer_reviews.text: You cannot beat this for the price if you just want to hang your cross bows on the wall. Very easy to install and very sturdy. I have two of them and I am about to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: High quality, works perfectly and holds up the weight strong! Hope to purchase another one soon!
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: Works well. Cheap. But doesn't look cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Good for tomahawk display but better as just a convenient tomahawk holder until you need to access it quickly for combat. Not that I expect to need it anytime soon, but it's better than the floor....
customer_reviews.author: botie

customer_reviews.title: its good
customer_reviews.text: I bought three and they are all well constructed and work well. rubberized padding on hooks has good grip and doesn"t leave marks or residue on firearms. hook will rotate so you can mount just about any rifle. fast shipping too.
customer_reviews.author: pat

customer_reviews.title: Great recurve bow mount. Will hold it level.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to hold a recurve bow. It's a good mount and in my case the fact that the arms can be twisted to different positions makes it perfect because the center of balance is in an uneven area and I could adjust the arms to still hold it level.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Weed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Very well made - ease of installation & looks good! Ordering another as I write this - highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Paul   A.  Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Works great and held my rifle with no problem
customer_reviews.text: Works great and held my rifle with no problem. Very sturdy. I now use it to hang my duty bet on without having to take all my equipment off. Belt weighs about 10-15 lbs and the hook doesn't budge.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Can be manupilated to fit your needs
customer_reviews.text: Does what its designed to do. I was able to bend and manipulate the hooks just how i wanted them as to firmly hold my shotgun above my bed. Im able to reach up grab the pistol grip and easily pull it out of the hooks. Best wall ornament in the house lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: works with any firearm
customer_reviews.text: mounted a 12 gauge and an AR-15 in the closet,
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: same as guitar holders.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my shotgun, not realizing it is the EXACT same size as the holders I have for my guitars. I already have tons of these. same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Skate&destroy

customer_reviews.title: sturdy crossbow hanger
customer_reviews.text: The hanger works perfect for holding my Barnett Recruit Recurve Crossbow with bolt quiver. Had to use the anchors to mount to wall because i couldn't hit a stud but it took about two minutes. Great product overall.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES OGLESBEE

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I installed with a set of heavy-duty drywall toggle bolts. Solid install and will hold any firearm that will fit between the hanger hooks. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: wjbent

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't go any other route.
customer_reviews.text: Super solid product. It looks great and functionality is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Zack Beebe

customer_reviews.title: worked exactly how i expected
customer_reviews.text: Holds our rrcurbe bow well and in several different ways. Easy to put up, just one screw into the wall. The nobs have a non slip rubber which prevent our bow from sliding. Exactly what I was looking for to mount our bow, and its very functional as we can take the bow down easily for daily use
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Looks great & Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Great way to store/display your bow when you're not hunting. I have a pair of these on my basement wall. They look nice and work very well.
customer_reviews.author: Zarr

customer_reviews.title: ... and a rifle and a shotgun those arms have awesome padding just get it if you want to easily ...
customer_reviews.text: if you want this to fit from everything to a pistol and a rifle and a shotgun those arms have awesome padding just get it if you want to easily diy vertical mount your gun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very good solution if you want to have a long gun on the ready
customer_reviews.text: awesome, i use one of these to hold up my rem 870 in the master bedroom closet. I have my wifes clothes pushed in front of it and it cannot be seen.
customer_reviews.author: jkaz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds great with a soft touch. Smelled pretty bad at first but seems to have vented off.
customer_reviews.author: Cecil S McRae

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a recurve bow she doesn't use very often but we didn't have a great place to put it. This little mount was easy to install and looks great. We are using it in our living room to mount the bow as decoration when not in use. The hooks are covered in a nice protective layer and capped with rubber so a nice weapon wont have direct contact with any metal.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great for in an RV!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to place a rifle/shotgun in RV when on trips for defense purposes. Works great, holds my 870 pump as well as my AR-15 just fine in the closet area. Rubber/plastic arms, hold a firearm securely, hasn't fallen out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Will Perry

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for holding my rifle ready to go in a closet. Also soft hangers so not to scratch the gun.
customer_reviews.author: aron

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's suppose to do
customer_reviews.text: Since no one posted a picture of it holding a bow, I thought I would share it! Otherwise, it was a good purchase! 5/7 would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son because his bow was always laying in random places in his bedroom. It works perfectly, looks great and was well worth the money I paid.
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nifty little fellow. durable, came with wall screws. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Solid design only give four stars purely do to the shallow amount of threads don't believe it could hold very much weigh>10 lbs for extended periods of time
customer_reviews.author: Travis Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great to hang bows
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made. I got these to hang my bows. The arms are coated and will protect the finish of your bow. Ordered 2 more for my daughter's bow.
customer_reviews.author: Hardright

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep a shotgun leaning against in the bedroom. I didn't want to scratch up and wall. Works great, holds very securly and does the job. Looks pretty nice for what it is too.
customer_reviews.author: captainstormy

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality and stellar wall mounts
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality!!! Came with some manly sized wall mounts too! Crossbow looks good hanging from it and it feels very secure. Not worried about it falling off the wall. Hooks are padded so there is no damage to your bow.
customer_reviews.author: BloodAgentTop Contributor: Star Wars

customer_reviews.title: Shotgun 24 inches from my bed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome addition to my room and also makes me feel safe having my gun so close
customer_reviews.author: Jon Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit for purpose. This is the second one I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Really cool. Inexpensive and easy to hook up
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son to hang paintball gun on to make room look neat. Really cool. Inexpensive and easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: recon32

customer_reviews.title: works great ..does the job
customer_reviews.text: I mounted it next to my bed and have my shotgun ready to go. I needed something to hold the gun and keep it from scratching paint off the wall . I would knock it against the knight stand too sometimes
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this mount for a Ruger 10/22 rifle and I'm very happy with it. It's a great value compared to some of the other mounts on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sporadic

customer_reviews.title: Great Pieces and Sturdy for Heavy Swords
customer_reviews.text: There great for my swords and they look very nice too. I bought 2 cause i liked it soo much.
customer_reviews.author: Barry S

customer_reviews.title: Really good wall displays
customer_reviews.text: These work really well. We also used them for holding guitars and Ukuleles on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It is a very well built design. It holds my metal legend of zelda sword and foam shield.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have bought 3, would buy more if needed.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my 12 gauge and 22 and katana. Doesn't scuff the guns of polished handles to my swords. Will also hold hand guns, but they make ones specifically for that too.
customer_reviews.author: ChaseW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Liked it and just ordered two more. Low frills, small, clean, just about disappears behind the gun.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my Pump
customer_reviews.text: Works well on mypump shotgun. I have it on wall in downstairs closet so I can get it quickly if needed. Took a long time to get this from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L

customer_reviews.title: Great vertical mount.
customer_reviews.text: Mount works well. I used it on the inside of a closet door for a double barrel shotgun and could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: VA boy

customer_reviews.title: Shotgun wall mount
customer_reviews.text: The hold up wall mount I purchased is made well and works well. Looks nice too. It is made for relatively light shotguns and rifles. 28 in. barrels guns are rifles are the maximum length guns that should be used with this mount.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Gearheard

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 of these to add to my gun ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these to add to my gun cabinet display. They look very sharp and hold the weight of my. 460 S&W no problem

customer_reviews.title: Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, feels strong and my bow looks beautiful displayed.

customer_reviews.title: I also bought two to hold shotguns - works great!
customer_reviews.text: used it to hang a flashlight for emergencies. I also bought two to hold shotguns - works great!

customer_reviews.title: Great quality all around
customer_reviews.text: This is way more then i expected! Great quality all around. I will buy more !!!

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product and I used two of them to mount ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and I used two of them to mount on to my bed's side rails for easy reach of the firearm.

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Does a pretty good job. I expected it to be a little more stable but it is working fine.

customer_reviews.title: Great Great !
customer_reviews.text: Great Great Great, easy install, hang a cross bow out of the way. Must have for crossbow owners.. Looks descent on the wall.

customer_reviews.title: Easy retrieval. <><
customer_reviews.text: Posts my Stoeger Coach shotgun right by my bed. Easy retrieval. <><

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mounted my compound bow to my living room wall. Holds up well, no issues so far.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for my gun. I have very similar mounts for my guitars. High quality materials.

customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I use it for my shotgun, and it's easy to adjust the holders if you want to change the angle of your gun slightly.

customer_reviews.text: Great product. I purchased three at first, they are so neat I bought four more.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mounts. I sanded down the base and dyed them black to match the decor of the apartment.

customer_reviews.title: worked out perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery (Was in with the brass set). I used this hanger for my colt .45 cal pistol/holster. worked out perfect.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mount! Holds my Mossberg 590A1 with a full ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mount! Holds my Mossberg 590A1 with a full magazine and shells on the sling no problem. Instillation was easy and it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Traci Cruz

customer_reviews.title: great for display and/or storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these initially to try them out, and learned quickly that I'd like to have at least half a dozen more! From my children's BB guns, to large flashlights, compound bows, or whatever, this is a quality and versatile product that I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Collins II

customer_reviews.title: Have it, used it, like it--need to buy more.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a stronger support than the usual hanger and this fits the bill, not for a gun or bow, but for a replica Medieval shield that weights at least 30 lbs.,of course I anchored it on a stud, but I wanted to be able to take the shield on and off a support that would protect the wood and leather handle and be easy to do so. Have confidence this will be a perminent hanger for this purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey Askew

customer_reviews.title: Hook
customer_reviews.text: Does the job perfectly. Although not the cheapest it was only one I could get sent to England. So happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs A McMinn

customer_reviews.title: Just good quality all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Simple little mount that came with some high quality install equipment and my compound bow is now more easily accessed, and also wall decoration, the only thing I did was add a small nail near the bottom limb to help keep the bow perfectly vertical.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Small and easy to install. Exctly what I was looking for. Delivery was on time.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: " Good sound idea for securing what some liberals think you ...
customer_reviews.text: "Hand me down my shotgun." Good sound idea for securing what some liberals think you don't need. Might get 2 or 3.
customer_reviews.author: G. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Remmington 870
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the Remmington 870 and seems very sturdy. However I was under the impression that the handle swivels, but it doesn't freely swivel. It is a screw and not a swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Randall

product_meta.title: Hold Up Displays - Vertical Gun Hanger and Rifle Storage Securely Holds Firearm and Bow - Real Hardwood Harvested in Wisconsin - Made in USA
product_meta.description: Vertically displays your rifle, shotgun or compound bow. Padded pivoting cradle. Available in ash, cherry, oak & black walnut hardwoods. To be mounted on a flat wall surface.
feature_bullets: ✔UNLIKE THE “TYPICAL” GUN HANGER OF UNKNOWN origin and quality that potentially puts your guns like Remington, Sig Sauer, Glock and Springfield Armory in “life threatening” danger, the HOLD UP DISPLAYS GUN HANGERS are CERTIFIED 100% MADE IN USA with REAL AMERICAN HARDWOOD and backed by a LIFETIME STRUCTURAL WARRANTY, all that to provide maximum structural integrity and safety, so no matter if you are shooting your guns or not, they are always in the “right hands”

✔GUNS ARE MEANT TO HAVE PROPER STORAGE – While safer when transported inside a case along with your lubricating oil, safety ear muffs, ammo, magazine and other tactical gear, guns are also practically “meant” to be displayed for your enjoyment even when you are not shooting, the HOLD UP DISPLAYS GUN HANGERS will turn your gun into a piece of “Wall Art” while keeping it safe and sound

✔YOKE PIVOTS TO ACCOMMODATE VARIOUS BUTTSTOCKS – Great for guns which have a headstock with single or uneven heels; Personalized protective padding gently and securely supports the firearm, unlike non padded wooden hangers that can leave scratches on your firearm; Deep cradle design prevents the gun from being improperly placed in the hanger

✔OVER 10 YEARS SERVING GUN OWNERS ALL OVER AMERICA – No matter what kind of firearm that you have, you can count on us to keep it safely stored, we have been crafting the best gun hangers and display systems that you can buy for over 10 years; Our products are manufactured in Wisconsin, where we started, and are guaranteed for life

✔LIFETIME STRUCTURAL WARRANTY - The HOLD UP DISPLAYS GUN HANGERS are CERTIFIED 100% MADE IN USA with REAL AMERICAN HARDWOOD and backed by a LIFETIME STRUCTURAL WARRANTY –and Add yours to cart Now and keep your gun safely stored while supplies last! (Product ID: HD01 Oak)
